headline: LifeLock Expands Identity Protection to Adapt to the Complexity of Americans' Financial Lives
summary: Identity theft is no longer a single moment of fraud. It's an ongoing risk that can affect many parts of a person's financial life, driven by scams, data exposure, and the misuse of personal information. As people open new accounts, build savings, make investments, or buy property, their financial lives become more complex, and new risks can quietly appear along the way.
